item.title: ITUB
item.description: score:7 Chances: Itau Unibanco Holding SA (NYSE:ITUB) announced a dividend of $0 per share, with the ex-dividend date set for 2024-03-28, spotlight shining on the company’s dividend history, yield, and growth rates.
